name: Monster Truck Driving Legends
description:
Exciting and realistic truck driving on impossible tracks - a brand new extreme monster truck stunt driving simulator. Sit in classy monster trucks and begin impossible stunt driving on tricky and tough mega ramps

Features
• Addictive game play with lots of fun
• Crazy super stunt cars
• Stunning visuals with highly-detailed environment
• Realistic Sounds for monster trucks destruction
• New Impossible monster stunts
• Smooth controls and addictive game play
